護佑.definition: to bless and protect; to protect

護國戰爭.definition: National Protection War or Campaign to Defend the Republic (1915), a rebellion against the installation of Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3] as emperor

護國軍.definition: National Protection Army of 1915 (in rebellion against Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3])

護國運動.definition: Campaign to Defend the Republic (1915) or National Protection War, a rebellion against the installation of Yuan Shikai 袁世凱|袁世凯[Yuan2 Shi4 kai3] as emperor

護封.definition: dust jacket (of a book); protective cover; document seal

護工.definition: nurse's aide; nursing assistant; care worker

護法.definition: to keep the law; to protect Buddha's teachings; protector of Buddhist law (i.e. temple donor)

護法戰爭.definition: National protection war or Campaign to defend the republic (1915), a rebellion against the installation of Yuan Shikai as emperor

護犢子.definition: (of a woman) to be fiercely protective of one's children

護理.definition: to nurse; to tend and protect

護生.definition: nursing student; (Buddhism) to preserve the lives of all living beings

護短.definition: to defend sb (a relative, friend or oneself) despite knowing that that person is in the wrong

護翼.definition: to provide protection; to take under one's wing; wings of a sanitary pad

護老者.definition: carer of elderly persons; aged care worker

護著.definition: to protect; to guard; to shield

護衛.definition: to guard; to protect; bodyguard (for officials in ancient times)

護貝膜.definition: see 護貝膠膜|护贝胶膜[hu4 bei4 jiao1 mo2]

護食.definition: (of a dog etc) to guard its food
